name: Gold Digger (M3MZ)
description:
THIS IS A VERY EARLY BUILD OF THE GAME, I PLAN TO ADD MORE IN THE FUTURE.

While looting an ancient monument, a  young adventurer falls into a trap that leads into a seemingly endless cave system. You must jump, run and use your pickaxe to throw yourself over deadly spikes and pitfalls to get out alive.

This game was made in 48 hours for Mini Jam 85

CONTROLS:

A/D: Movement

Space: Jump

Left Click: Use your pickaxe to push yourself off of certain walls

FUTURE PLANS:

  • Fixing collision and audio bugs
  • adding enemies
  • adding more levels
  • making new mechanics like the pickaxe launch

THIRD-PARTY ASSETS USED:

Environment: https://opengameart.org/content/spelunky-inspired-tileset
Spikes and Coins: https://opengameart.org/content/items-and-elements

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/curse-of-the-djinn
